Thu, 24 Oct 2024 02:41:31 +0000 Police released an image of Kael Leona after a fatal stabbing on a bus in Onehunga. He was last seen in the area wearing a dark jumper with shoes, he had a green t-shirt on his head and was carrying a black pack. The public were advised not to approach the man. Photo Composite: NZME/NZ Police
